com.esri.mo2.data.omc
Class Cache

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.esri.mo2.data.omc.Cache
public final class Cache
extends Object

This class implements a static object that serves as the cache for all Cacheable/Identifiable objects in an application.

Method Summary
 void flush()
          Releases all stored features.
static Cache get()
          Returns the singleton memory cache.
 Cursor select(SelectionSet selectionSet)
          Selects all the Identifiables in a Cacheable with given selection set.
